DRINKS.name: Old-Fashioned
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 lemon twist and 1 orange twist
DRINKS.directions: Muddle the sugar cube and bitters in an Old-Fashioned glass. Add the bourbon and 1 large ice cube and stir until chilled. Garnish with the lemon and orange twists.

DRINKS.name: Our Ideal Old-Fashioned
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 orange twist and 1 lemon twist
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, thengently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Golden Boy
ingredients: ¼ ounce Busnel Pays d’Auge VSOP Calvados
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Vermouth Cocktail
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Exit Strategy
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Ti’ Punch
ingredients: 1½-inch-thick disk of lime peel with some flesh attached
DRINKS.garnish: 2 ounces La Favorite Couer de Canne rhum agricole blanc
DRINKS.directions: In an Old-Fashioned glass, muddle the lime and syrup. Add the rum, fill the glass with cracked ice, and stir briefly. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Fancy-Free
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Monte Carlo
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the lemon twist over the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Chrysanthemum
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Stinger
ingredients: ½ ounce white crème de menthe
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint sprig and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Normandie Club Old-Fashioned
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Spiced Almond Demerara Gum Syrup
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 dried apple slice on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the dried apple slice.

DRINKS.name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
ingredients: 2 ounces Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Pop Quiz
ingredients: 2 ounces Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Night Owl
ingredients: 2 ounces Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
3 dashes Miracle Mile toasted pecan bitters
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Dave Fernie’s Old-Fashioned
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 orange twist and 1 lemon twist
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Snowbird
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek 2-year apple brandy
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the grapefruit twist over the drink and place it into the glass.

DRINKS.name: Cold Girl Fever
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 orange twist and 1 lemon twist
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Ned Ryerson
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek 2-year apple brandy
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Deadpan
ingredients: ¼ ounce Lustau East India solera sherry
¼ ounce Giffard Vanille de Madagascar
1 dash Bitter Truth Jerry Thomas bitters
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Autumn Old-Fashioned
ingredients: ½ ounce Laird’s 100-proof straight apple brandy
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 orange twist and 1 lemon twist
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Bad Santa
ingredients: 2 ounces Cocoa Butter–Infused Absolut Elyx Vodka
¼ ounce Giffard white crème de cacao
¼ ounce Giffard Vanille de Madagascar
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the candy cane.

DRINKS.name: Beach Bonfire
ingredients: 1½ ounces Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 dehydrated pineapple slice and a glass of pilsner
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Using a PolyScience Smoking Gun or something similar, shoot some hickory smoke over the drink to create just a whisper of smoke aroma (see alongside.

DRINKS.name: Champagne Cocktail
DRINKS.directions: Place the sugar cube on a paper towel. Dash the bitters over the sugar cube until it’s completely saturated. Drop the sugar cube into a chilled flute and slowly top with Champagne; don’t stir. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: The Field Marshall
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients (except the Champagne) over ice, then strain into a chilled flute. Pour in the Champagne, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the Champagne with the cocktail. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Pretty Wings
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients (except the Champagne) over ice, then strain into a chilled flute. Pour in the Champagne, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the Champagne with the cocktail. Garnish with the lemon wheel.

DRINKS.name: Celebrate
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek pear brandy
¼ ounce Lustau Jarana fino sherry
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients (except the Champagne) over ice, then strain into a chilled flute. Pour in the Champagne and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the Champagne with the cocktail. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Mint Julep
DRINKS.directions: Rub the interior of a Julep tin with the mint bouquet, then set the mint aside. Add the bourbon and syrup and fill the tin halfway with crushed ice. Holding the tin by the rim, stir, churning the ice as you go, for about 10 seconds. Add more crushed ice to fill the tin about two-thirds full and stir until the tin is completely frosted. Add more ice to form a cone above the rim. Garnish with the mint bouquet and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Last One Standing
ingredients: ½ ounce Hamilton Jamaican pot still gold rum
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 peach slice and confectioners’ sugar
DRINKS.directions: Rub the interior of a Julep tin with the mint bouquet, then set the mint aside. Add the remaining ingredients and fill the tin halfway with crushed ice. Holding the tin by the rim, stir, churning the ice as you go, for about 10 seconds. Add more crushed ice to fill the tin about two-thirds full and stir until the tin is completely frosted. Add more ice to form a cone above the rim. Garnish with the mint bouquet and peach slice, then lightly dust the top of the mint with confectioners’ sugar. Serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Heritage Julep
ingredients: 1¼ ounces Busnel Pays d’Auge VSOP Calvados
½ ounce Clear Creek pear liqueur
¼ ounce Clear Creek pear brandy
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 3 apple slices on a skewer and confectioners’ sugar
DRINKS.directions: Rub the interior of a Julep tin with the mint bouquet, then set the mint aside. Add the remaining ingredients and fill the tin halfway with crushed ice. Holding the tin by the rim, stir, churning the ice as you go, for about 10 seconds. Add more crushed ice to fill the tin about two-thirds full and stir until the tin is completely frosted. Add more ice to form a cone above the rim. Garnish with the mint bouquet and the apple slices, then lightly dust the top of the mint with the confectioners’ sugar. Serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Camellia Julep
ingredients: ½ ounce Lustau Los Arcos amontillado sherry
DRINKS.directions: Rub the interior of a Julep tin with the mint bouquet, then set the mint aside. Add the remaining ingredients and fill the tin halfway with crushed ice. Holding the tin by the rim, stir, churning the ice as you go, for about 10 seconds. Add more crushed ice to fill the tin about two-thirds full and stir until the tin is completely frosted. Add more ice to form a cone above the rim. Garnish with the mint bouquet and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Sazerac
DRINKS.directions: Rinse an Old-Fashioned glass with absinthe and dump. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice, then strain into the glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink and discard.

DRINKS.name: Cut and Paste
DRINKS.directions: Rinse a chilled Old-Fashioned glass with absinthe and dump. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice, then strain into the glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Save Tonight
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek 2-year apple brandy
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 brandied cherry on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Rinse a chilled Old-Fashioned glass with absinthe and dump. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice, then strain into the glass. Garnish with the cherry.

DRINKS.name: Bananarac
ingredients: ½ ounce Giffard Banane du Brésil
DRINKS.directions: Rinse a chilled Old-Fashioned glass with absinthe and dump. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice, then strain into the glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink and discard.

DRINKS.name: Sherry Cobbler
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 orange half wheel and 1 mint bouquet
DRINKS.directions: In a Collins glass, muddle the orange slices and syrup. Add the sherry and stir briefly. Top with crushed ice and stir a few times to chill the cocktail. Top with more crushed ice, packing the glass fully. Garnish with the orange half wheel and mint bouquet and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Traction
ingredients: 1½ ounces Lustau Los Arcos amontillado sherry
¾ ounce Milk & Honey House Curaçao
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: ½ strawberry, 1 lemon wedge, and 1 mint sprig
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, muddle the lemon wedges and strawberry halves. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Double strain into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the strawberry half, lemon wedge, and mint sprig and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Peeping Tomboy
ingredients: ¼ ounce Pierre Ferrand Ambre Cognac
¼ ounce Toasted Almond–Infused Apricot Liqueur
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 mint sprig, 1 lemon wheel, 1 orange wheel, and 1 slice seasonal stone fruit
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, muddle the lemon wedge and orange wheel with the syrup. Add the remaining ingredients and whip with a few pieces of crushed ice just until incorporated. Strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass and top with more crushed ice, cresting it over the top of the glass. Garnish with the mint sprig and fruit slices and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Hot Toddy
ingredients: 1½ ounces Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
DRINKS.directions: Squeeze the lemon wedges into a toddy mug, then add the remaining ingredients (except the water). Pour in the boiling water, then grate some nutmeg over the top of the drink and garnish with the lemon wedges.

DRINKS.name: In Hot Water
ingredients: ½ ounce dark, robust maple syrup
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients (except the water) in a mixing glass and stir. Pour into a toddy mug, then pour in the boiling water. Garnish with the cinnamon stick.

DRINKS.name: Gun Club Toddy
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 5 thin apple slices on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients (except the water) in a mixing glass and stir. Pour into a toddy mug, then pour in the boiling water. Garnish with the apple slices.

DRINKS.name: Heat Miser
ingredients: ½ ounce Alexander Jules amontillado sherry
½ ounce dark, robust maple syrup
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 3 thin apple slices on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients in a small saucepan over medium-low heat and cook, stirring occasionally, until steaming hot but not simmering. Pour into a toddy mug and garnish with the apple slices.

DRINKS.name: Gin Martini
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist (expressed over the drink and set on the edge of the glass) or olive.

DRINKS.name: Vodka Martini
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist (expressed over the drink and set on the edge of the glass) or olive.

DRINKS.name: Our Ideal Gin Martini
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Our Ideal Vodka Martini
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the olive.

DRINKS.name: Vesper
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Dean Martin
ingredients: ¼ ounce Clear Creek Douglas fir brandy
½ ounce La Quintinye Vermouth Royal blanc
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Mist the top of the drink with the tincture.

DRINKS.name: Martini (Very Dry)
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Martini (Our Root Recipe)
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Martini (Wet)
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Normandie Club Martini #1
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 3 or 4 sprays of Sel Gris Solution
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Mist the top of the drink with the Sel Gris Solution.

DRINKS.name: Little Victory
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then double strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the orange wedge.

DRINKS.name: Six Ways to Season a Martini: A Garnish Experiment
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 cocktail olive, 1 pickled onion, 1 lemon twist, 1 orange twist, and 1 lime twist
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into six coupes. Leave the first glass without a garnish, add the olive to the second, add the onion to the third, and express the citrus twists over each of the remaining glasses, then place the peels into the drinks.

DRINKS.name: David Kaplan’s Favorite Martini
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Manhattan
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the cherry.

DRINKS.name: Perfect Manhattan
ingredients: ½ ounce Cocchi Vermouth di Torino
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Blood Orange
ingredients: 1½ ounces Blood Orange–Infused Carpano Antica Formula
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the blood orange wheel.

DRINKS.name: Martinez
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Mea Culpa
ingredients: ¾ ounce Alexander Jules fino sherry
¼ ounce Williams & Humbert Dry Sack sherry
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Beth’s Going to Town
ingredients: ½ ounce Carpano Antica sweet vermouth
¼ ounce Giffard Abricot du Roussillon
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with the mint leaf.

DRINKS.name: Brooklyn
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the cherry.

DRINKS.name: Poet’s Dream
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: European Union
ingredients: ¾ ounce Carpano Antica Formula vermouth
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the cherry.

DRINKS.name: Watercress
ingredients: ½ teaspoon Giffard Crème de Pêche
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the apple slice.

DRINKS.name: Negroni
ingredients: 1 ounce Carpano Antica Formula sweet vermouth
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the orange half wheel.

DRINKS.name: Strawberry Negroni
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the strawberry slice.

DRINKS.name: White Negroni
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: La Rosita
ingredients: ½ ounce Carpano Antica Formula vermouth
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Boulevardier
ingredients: 1½ ounces Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
¾ ounce Carpano Antica Formula vermouth
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the cherry.

DRINKS.name: Old Pal
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Abbot Kinney
ingredients: ¼ ounce Fusion Napa Valley verjus blanc
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Twist the celery ribbon into a spiral and balance it on the rim of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Bamboo
ingredients: 1½ ounces Lustau Los Arcos amontillado sherry
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Sonoma
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Fusion Napa Valley verjus blanc
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 4 sprays of White Pepper–Infused Vodka
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Mist the top of the drink with the infused vodka.

DRINKS.name: Meyer Lemon Aperitif
ingredients: 4 ounces Campo de Encanto Moscatel pisco
DRINKS.directions: Combine half of the sherry, vermouths, pisco, and zest in an iSi whipper (see , infuse the mixture. Strain through a fine-mesh sieve and transfer to a large bowl. Repeat with the remaining sherry, vermouths, pisco, and zest. Add the syrup, bitters, and water to the mixture and stir to combine, then transfer to a 1-liter bottle. Seal and refrigerate until cold. Serve in chilled coupes (this recipe makes ten drinks), garnished with the Meyer lemon wheels.

DRINKS.name: Daiquiri
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Our Ideal Daiquiri
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Basic Sour
ingredients: ¾ ounce fresh lemon or lime juice
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Daiquiri (Light Rum)
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

DRINKS.name: Daiquiri (Funky Rum)
ingredients: 2 ounces La Favorite Coeur de Canne rhum agricole blanc
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

DRINKS.name: Daiquiri (Aged Rum)
ingredients: 2 ounces Appleton Estate Reserve Blend rum
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

DRINKS.name: Amaretto Sour
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 orange half wheel and 1 brandied cherry on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the orange half wheel and cherry.

DRINKS.name: Fresh Gimlet
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Daiquiri (Classic)
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

DRINKS.name: Daiquiri (Less Sweetener)
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

DRINKS.name: Daiquiri (More Lime Juice)
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

DRINKS.name: Pisco Sour
ingredients: 2 ounces Campo de Encanto Grand and Noble pisco
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Carefully garnish the top of the foam with the bitters.

DRINKS.name: Hemingway Daiquiri
ingredients: 1½ ounces Flor de Caña 4-year white rum
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Tarby Party
ingredients: ¼ ounce Neisson rhum agricole blanc
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with 1 large ice cube until very cold and frothy. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Zombie Punch
ingredients: ¾ ounce Hamilton Demerara 151 Overproof rum
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: Mint sprig, 1 cherry, 1 orange slice, 1 parasol, and 1 pineapple wedge
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a Zombie-size tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint sprig, cherry, orange slice, parasol, and pineapple wedge.

DRINKS.name: Southside
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, gently muddle the mint. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with the mint leaf.

DRINKS.name: Boukman Daiquiri
ingredients: 1½ ounces Flor de Cana 4-year white rum
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Jack Rose
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek 2-year apple brandy
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the apple slice.

DRINKS.name: Bee’s Knees
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Pink Lady
ingredients: ½ ounce Laird’s 100-proof straight apple brandy
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 brandied cherry on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with the cherry.

DRINKS.name: Whiskey Sour
ingredients: 2 ounces Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

DRINKS.name: Cat Video
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 lemon twist and 1 edible flower
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients without ice, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Express the lemon twist over the top of the drink and discard, then garnish with the edible flower.

DRINKS.name: Smoke and Mirrors
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, gently muddle the mint with the simple syrup. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the mint sprig.

DRINKS.name: Pompadour
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Smokescreen
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, gently muddle the mint with the simple syrup. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the mint sprig.

DRINKS.name: Kentucky Maid
ingredients: 2 ounces Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 mint sprig skewered through 1 cucumber wheel
DRINKS.directions: Put the mint in a shaker and top with the cucumbers. Add the simple syrup and muddle, making sure to break up the cucumber skins. Add the bourbon and lime juice and shake with ice. Strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the mint sprig skewered through a cucumber wheel.

DRINKS.name: High Five
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a high five—seriously!

DRINKS.name: Brown Derby
ingredients: 2 ounces Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Mojito
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, gently muddle the mint leaves, simple syrup, and sugar cube until the sugar cube breaks apart. Add the remaining ingredients and whip, shaking with a few pieces of crushed ice, just until incorporated. Dump into a Collins glass and add crushed ice until the glass is about four-fifths full. Swizzle for a few seconds, then pack the glass with ice, mounding it above the rim. Garnish with the mint bouquet, placing it in the center of the ice and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Jack Frost
ingredients: ¾ ounce Clear Creek pear brandy
¾ ounce La Quintinye Vermouth Royal extra dry
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 mint and sage bouquet and confectioners’ sugar
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker and whip, shaking with a few pieces of crushed ice, just until incorporated. Dump into a Collins glass and add crushed ice until the glass is about four-fifths full. Swizzle for a few seconds, then pack the glass with ice, mounding it above the rim. Garnish with the mint and sage bouquet, and finish with a dusting of confectioners’ sugar. Serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Mai Tai
ingredients: 1 ounce Appleton Estate Reserve Blend rum
1 ounce La Favorite Coeur de Canne rhum agricole blanc
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker and whip, shaking with a few pieces of crushed ice, just until incorporated. Dump into a double Old-Fashioned glass, then pack the glass with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint bouquet.

DRINKS.name: Touch and Go
ingredients: ½ mandarin orange, cut into 4 pieces
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, gently muddle the orange with the basil syrup. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice, then dump into a double Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with the basil leaf.

DRINKS.name: Caipirinha
DRINKS.directions: Cut the lime in half crosswise, then cut each half into quarters. Put 6 of the pieces in a shaker, reserving the other 2 for another use. Add the simple syrup and sugar cube and gently muddle the lime, carefully pressing each piece. Add the cachaça and shake with ice, then dump into a double Old-Fashioned glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Tom Collins
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 orange half wheel and 1 brandied cherry on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Pour the seltzer into a Collins glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and garnish with the orange half wheel and cherry.

DRINKS.name: Grapefruit Collins
DRINKS.directions: Pour the seltzer into a Collins glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and garnish with the grapefruit half wheel.

DRINKS.name: Parachute
ingredients: 1 ounce Quinta do Infantado white port
DRINKS.directions: Pour the tonic water into a Collins glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and garnish with the grapefruit half wheel.

DRINKS.name: Moscow Mule
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 lime wheel and 1 piece of candied ginger on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Pour the seltzer into a Collins glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and garnish with the lime wheel and candied ginger.

DRINKS.name: Dark and Stormy
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 lime wheel and 1 piece of candied ginger on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Pour the seltzer into a Collins glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and garnish with the lime wheel and candied ginger.

DRINKS.name: Silver Fizz
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients (except the seltzer), then shake again with ice. Double strain into a fizz glass. Slowly add the seltzer, occasionally tapping the bottom of the glass on a table or flat surface to settle the foam. As you finish adding the seltzer, a white puck of foam should form on top of the drink. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients (except the seltzer), then fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake for 5 minutes. Double strain into a pint glass. Slowly add the seltzer, occasionally tapping the bottom of the glass on a table or flat surface to settle the foam. As you finish adding the seltzer, a white puck of foam should form on top of the drink. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Presbyterian
DRINKS.directions: Pour the seltzer into a Collins glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and garnish with the lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Old Cuban
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients (except the sparkling wine) with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. Pour in the Champagne, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the wine with the cocktail. Garnish with the mint leaf.

DRINKS.name: French 75
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients (except the sparkling wine) with ice, then strain into a chilled flute. Pour in the sparkling wine, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the sparkling wine with the cocktail. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: The Eliza
ingredients: ¼ ounce Clear Creek pear brandy
¼ ounce Giffard Cassis Noir du Bourgogne
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients (except the sparkling wine) with ice, then strain into a flute. Pour in the sparkling wine, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the winewith the cocktail.

DRINKS.name: Ice Queen
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, gently muddle the cucumber with the simple syrup. Add the remaining ingredients (except the sparkling wine) and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Pour in the sparkling wine, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the wine with the cocktail. Express the lime twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Accidental Guru
ingredients: ½ ounce Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne
3½ ounces cold Blanche de Bruxelles beer (or another wheat beer)
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients (except the beer) with ice, then strain into a large chilled fizz glass. Pour in the beer, then garnish with the lime wheel.

DRINKS.name: Sidecar
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Our Ideal Sidecar
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Cognac Sour
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Sidecar (Boozy)
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Sidecar (Balanced)
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Margarita
DRINKS.directions: Rub the lime wedge along the upper ½ inch of a double Old-Fashioned glass, halfway around the circumference, then roll the wet portion in the salt. Put 1 large ice cube in the glass. Shake the remaining ingredients with ice, then strain into the prepared glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Margarita (Dry)
DRINKS.directions: Use the lime wedge and salt to rim a double Old-Fashioned glass as in the preceding recipe, then put 1 large ice cube in the glass. Shake the remaining ingredients with ice, then strain into the prepared glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Margarita (Sweet)
DRINKS.directions: Use the lime wedge and salt to rim a double Old-Fashioned glass as in the preceding recipe, then put 1 large ice cube in the glass. Shake the remaining ingredients with ice, then strain into the prepared glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Between the Sheets
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Between the Sheets (Ideal)
ingredients: 1 ounce Appleton Estate Reserve Blend rum
¾ ounce Pierre Ferrand dry curaçao
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: White Lady
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Rational Thought
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek pear brandy
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Peaches and Smoke
ingredients: ½ ounce Pierre Ferrand Ambre Cognac
¾ ounce Giffard Crème de Pêche
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, muddle the peach. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the peach wedge.

DRINKS.name: Beausoleil
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek Pinot Noir grappa
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with the thyme sprig.

DRINKS.name: 20th Century
ingredients: ¾ ounce white crème de cacao
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Last Word
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Crop Top
ingredients: ¾ ounce Giffard Crème de Pamplemousse
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Why Not
ingredients: ½ ounce dark, robust maple syrup
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 sage leaf and 1 lemon wheel
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with the sage leaf and lemon wheel.

DRINKS.name: Cosmopolitan
ingredients: ½ ounce pure, unsweetened cranberry juice
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the lime wheel.

DRINKS.name: Clarified Cosmopolitan
ingredients: ½ ounce unsweetened pure cranberry juice
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the lime wheel.

DRINKS.name: Lily Pad
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 basil leaf, preferably Thai basil
DRINKS.directions: In a cocktail shaker, gently muddle the basil leaves and simple syrup. Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the basil leaf.

DRINKS.name: Pegu Cub Cocktail
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Modern Display
ingredients: ½ ounce Lustau Los Arcos amontillado sherry
½ ounce Giffard Crème de Pamplemousse
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Champs-Élysées
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Four to the Floor
ingredients: 1½ ounces Campo de Encanto Grand and Noble pisco
¾ ounce Giffard Crème de Pamplemousse
¾ ounce Fusion Napa Valley verjus blanc
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 green grape on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the grape.

DRINKS.name: La Valencia
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Corpse Reviver #2
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Fish House Punch
ingredients: ¾ ounce Pierre Ferrand Ambre Cognac
¾ ounce Appleton Estate Reserve Blend rum
¾ ounce Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne
DRINKS.directions: Pour the seltzer into a Collins glass or goblet. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes, then garnish with the lemon wheel and grate some nutmeg over the top of the drink.

DRINKS.name: Chatham Cocktail
ingredients: ¾ ounce Lustau Puerto fino sherry
DRINKS.directions: Short shake all the ingredients (except the Champagne) with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into a chilled flute. Pour in the Champagne, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the Champagne with the cocktail. Express the grapefruit twist over the drink and then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Twist of Menton
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the strawberry slice.

DRINKS.name: Long Island Iced Tea
DRINKS.directions: Pour the cola into a pint glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and garnish with the lemon wedge.

DRINKS.name: Whisky Highball
DRINKS.directions: Pour the scotch into a Highball glass, then add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the seltzer and stir once. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

DRINKS.name: Our Ideal Whisky Highball
DRINKS.directions: Pour the whisky into a Highball glass and add 1 ice cube. Let sit for 3 seconds. Add the seltzer and stir once. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Americano
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 orange half wheel and a small bottle of cold seltzer
DRINKS.directions: Pour the Campari and vermouth into a Highball glass, then add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the seltzer and stir once. Garnish with the orange half wheel and serve with a bottle of seltzer.

DRINKS.name: Paloma
ingredients: ¼ ounce Giffard Crème de Pamplemousse
DRINKS.directions: Rub the lime wedge along the upper ½ inch of a Highball glass, halfway around the circumference, then roll the wet portion in the salt. Pour in the tequila, Pamplemousse, and lime juices, then add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the soda and stir once. Garnish with the grapefruit wedge.

DRINKS.name: Cuba Libre
DRINKS.directions: Pour the rum into a Highball glass, then add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the lime juice and cola and stir once. Garnish with the lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Negroni Sbagliato
DRINKS.directions: Pour the vermouth and Campari into a Highball glass and stir to combine. Fill the glass with ice cubes, then pour in the prosecco and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the wine with the cocktail. Garnish with the orange wedge.

DRINKS.name: Screwdriver
DRINKS.directions: Taste the juice before mixing. If the flavor seems a little flat, add a bit of Citric Acid Solution, a drop at a time, until the flavor is sweet with a tangy bite. Combine the orange juice and vodka in a Highball glass, then add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Tequila Sunrise
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 orange half wheel and 1 lime wedge
DRINKS.directions: Combine the tequila, orange juice, and lime juice in a Highball glass,then add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the grenadine and don’t stir so it will settle to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with the orange half wheel and lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Gin and Tonic
DRINKS.directions: Pour the gin into a Highball glass, then add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the tonic water and stir once. Garnish with the lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Harvey Wallbanger
DRINKS.directions: Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes for about 5 seconds, then strain into a Highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with the orange half wheel.

DRINKS.name: Normandie Club Bloody Mary
ingredients: 5 ounces Normandie Club Bloody Mary Mix
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 cherry tomato and 1 lemon wedge on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Rub the lemon wedge along the upper ½ inch of a Collins glass, halfway around the circumference, then roll the wet portion in the Lemon Pepper Salt. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the remaining ingredients and stir a few times. Garnish with the cherry tomato and lemon wedge.

DRINKS.name: Calvados and Tonic
ingredients: 2 ounces Domaine de Montreuil Pays d’Auge Réserve Calvados
DRINKS.directions: Pour the Calvados into a Highball glass, then add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the tonic and stir once. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Bloody Mary
ingredients: Kosher salt and pepper, for rimming
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 lemon wedge and 1 celery stalk
DRINKS.directions: On a small plate, mix equal parts of salt and pepper. Rub the lemon wedge along the upper ¼ inch of a pint glass, halfway around the circumference, then roll the wet portion in the salt and pepper. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the remaining ingredients and stir a few times. Garnish with the lemon wedge and celery stalk.

DRINKS.name: Bloody Mary Verde
ingredients: Kosher salt and chile powder, for rimming
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 cherry tomato and 1 lemon wedge on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: On a small plate, mix equal parts of kosher salt and chile powder. Rub the lime wedge along the upper ¼ inch of a Collins glass, halfway around the circumference, then roll the wet portion in the salt mixture. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the remaining ingredients and stir a few times. Garnish with the cherry tomato and lemon wedge.

DRINKS.name: Nobody’s Robots
ingredients: 1 ounce Williams & Humbert Dry Sack sherry
DRINKS.directions: Chill all the ingredients. Combine them in a carbonating bottle, charge with CO for detailed carbonation instructions). Refrigerate the carbonating bottle for at least 20 minutes, and preferably for 12 hours, before opening. Pour into an ice-filled Highball glass and garnish with the orange half wheel.

DRINKS.name: Mimosa
DRINKS.directions: Combine the orange juice and Citric Acid Solution in a chilled flute. Pour in the sparkling wine, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the wine with the cocktail. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Apple Pop
ingredients: 1 ounce Drouin Blanche de Normandie apple brandy
½ ounce Clear Creek pear brandy
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 mint sprig and 1 celery leaf
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients (except the soda) in a Highball glass, then add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the soda and stir once. Garnish with the mint sprig and celery leaf.

DRINKS.name: Bellini
DRINKS.directions: Put the peach puree in a flute. Pour in the prosecco, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the prosecco with the cocktail. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Kir Royale
ingredients: ½ ounce Gabriel Boudier Crème de Cassis de Dijon
DRINKS.directions: Pour the crème de cassis into a chilled flute, then pour in the Champagne and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the Champagne with the cocktail. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: St-Germain Cocktail
DRINKS.directions: Pour the St-Germain into a Highball glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes, then pour in the sparkling wine and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the wine with the cocktail. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Aperol Spritz
ingredients: 3 ounces cold prosecco or dry Champagne-style sparkling wine
DRINKS.directions: Pour the Aperol into a wineglass. Fill the glass with ice cubes, then pour in the sparkling wine and seltzer and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the wine with the cocktail. Garnish with the grapefruit wedge.

DRINKS.name: Normandie Club Spritz #1
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek Douglas Fir Eau de Vie
DRINKS.directions: Chill all the ingredients. Combine in a carbonating bottle, charge with CO for detailed carbonation instructions). Pour over ice in a small white wine glass. Garnish with the mint sprig.

DRINKS.name: Daisy Chain
ingredients: ½ ounce Fusion Napa Valley verjus blanc
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 5 thin apple slices on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients (except the cider) in a wineglass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir until chilled. Top with the cider and stir gently to combine. Garnish with the apple slices.

DRINKS.name: Normandie Club Spritz #3
ingredients: ¼ ounce Pueblo Viejo blanco tequila
¼ ounce Campo de Encanto Grand and Noble pisco
¼ ounce Giffard Crème de Pamplemousse
DRINKS.directions: Chill all the ingredients. Combine in a carbonating bottle, charge with CO for detailed carbonation instructions). Refrigerate the carbonating bottle for at least 20 minutes, and preferably for 12 hours, before opening. Pour into an ice-filled Highball glass and garnish with the grapefruit half wheel.

DRINKS.name: Improved Wine Spritz
ingredients: 4 ounces cold, crisp white or rosé wine
DRINKS.directions: Combine the wine, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a wineglass. Fill the glass with ice cubes, pour in the seltzer, and stir gently to combine. Garnish with the lemon wheel.

DRINKS.name: Wine Spritz
ingredients: 4 ounces cold, crisp white or rosé wine
DRINKS.directions: Pour the wine into a wineglass. Fill the glass with ice cubes, then pour in the seltzer and stir once. Garnish with the lemon wheel.

DRINKS.name: King’s Landing
ingredients: 1½ ounces Birch-Infused Cocchi Vermouth di Torino
½ ounce Clear Creek pear liqueur
DRINKS.directions: Combine the infused vermouth, pear liqueur, and lemon juice in a wineglass. Fill the glass with ice cubes, then pour in the cava and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the wine with the cocktail. Garnish with the lemon wheel.

DRINKS.name: Flip
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a few grates of nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: Our Ideal Flip
ingredients: 2 ounces González Byass Matusalem oloroso sherry
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a few grates of nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: Brandy Flip
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a few grates of nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: Coffee Cocktail
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a few grates of nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: Eggnog
ingredients: ¾ ounce Pierre Ferrand Ambre Cognac
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with a few grates of cinnamon and nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: Brandy Alexander
ingredients: 1 ounce Giffard white crème de cacao
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a few grates of nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: New York Flip
ingredients: 1 ounce Elijah Craig Small Batch bourbon
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a few grates of nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: Almond Orchard
ingredients: 1½ ounces A Field in Innsbruck Tea–Infused Apple Brandy
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients in a small saucepan over medium-low heat and cook, stirring frequently, until steaming but not simmering. Pour into a coffee mug, small wooden bowl, or large sake cup. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Barnaby Jones
ingredients: ½ ounce dark, robust maple syrup
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a few grates of cinnamon.

DRINKS.name: Jump in the Line
ingredients: 1½ ounces Lustau Los Arcos amontillado sherry
¼ ounce La Favorite Ambre rhum agricole
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 pineapple leaf, 1 orange half wheel, and 1 mint sprig
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, gently muddle the orange half wheel and strawberry. Add the remaining ingredients and short shake with ice, then double strain into a Collins glass. Fill the glass with crushed ice. Garnish with the pineapple leaf, orange half wheel, and mint sprig and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Bean Me Up Biscotti
ingredients: ¼ ounce Faretti Biscotti Famosi liqueur
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a small white wine glass. Garnish with a few grates of nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: N2O Ramos Gin Fizz
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients (except the seltzer) in an iSi whipper; don’t add any ice. Seal and shake for 20 seconds. Open, add five 1-inch ice cubes, then seal tightly once again. Charge with an NO cartridge, then shake for 10 seconds. Release the first burst of pressure into a cocktail shaker or other vessel, then turn the canister all the way upside down and dispense the cocktail into a large glass. Let settle for about 1 minute. Carefully add the cold seltzer, pouring it down a spoon to ensure that it goes directly to the bottom of the glass and lifts the foamy cocktail above the rim of the glass. No garnish. This technique can be applied to any cocktail containing proteins that will bond around air when agitated (eggs and cream, for example) to make a frothy drink.

DRINKS.name: White Russian
DRINKS.directions: Combine the vodka and liqueur in a double Old-Fashioned glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir briefly. Layer the half-and-half on top. Garnish with the coffee beans.

DRINKS.name: Irish Coffee
DRINKS.directions: Using a bowl and whisk, whip the cream until soft peaks begin to form. Warm a coffee or toddy mug by filling it with boiling water, letting it sit a minute or two, then dumping out the water. Pour in the whiskey and syrup, then slowly add the coffee while stirring continuously. Carefully spoon all the whipped cream on top of the drink.

DRINKS.name: Grasshopper
ingredients: 1 ounce Tempus Fugit white crème de menthe
1 ounce Giffard white crème de cacao
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the mint leaf, placing it on top of the drink.

DRINKS.name: Tom and Jerry
DRINKS.directions: Warm a coffee mug or teacup by filling it with boiling water, letting it sit a minute or two, then dumping out the water. Pour in the rum and Cognac, then add the batter. Stir until well combined, then slowly add the hot milk. Garnish with a few grates of nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: Golden Cadillac
ingredients: 1 ounce Giffard white crème de cacao
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a few grates of dark chocolate.

DRINKS.name: Piña Colada
ingredients: ½ ounce Cruzan Black Strap rum
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 pineapple wedge and 1 brandied cherry on an umbrella skewer
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker and whip, shaking with a few pieces of crushed ice, just until incorporated, then dump into a double Old-Fashioned glass and fill the glass with crushed ice. Garnish with the pineapple wedge and cherry and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Frozen Mudslide
ingredients: 3 scoops vanilla or coffee ice cream
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients in a blender and process until smooth. Pour into a Collins glass and serve with a straw and long spoon. Garnish with grated dark chocolate.

DRINKS.name: Hans Gruber
ingredients: ¼ ounce dark, robust maple syrup
¾ ounce Brown Butter–Infused Apple Brandy
1 ounce Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez sherry
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 spritz of Cruzan Black Strap rum
DRINKS.directions: Using a bowl and whisk, whip the cream and maple syrup together just until soft peaks start to form. In a mixing glass, stir the remaining ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Carefully spoon the whipped cream on top, then mist the blackstrap rum over the drink.

DRINKS.name: Indulge
ingredients: ¾ ounce Brown Butter–Infused Apple Brandy
½ ounce Spiced Almond Demerara Gum Syrup
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients in a small saucepan over medium-low heat and cook, stirring frequently, until steaming hot but not simmering. Pour into a coffee mug or small teacup. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Saturday Morning Cartoons
ingredients: ¼ ounce Giffard Vanille de Madagascar
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients (except the cereal) in a mixing glass and stir to mix well. Pour over cereal in a bowl and serve with a spoon. Be sure to lap up any remaining liquid!

DRINKS.name: Aces and Eights
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Affinity
ingredients: 2 ounces Compass Box Oak Cross scotch
½ ounce Carpano Antica Formula vermouth
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Aviation
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the cherry.

DRINKS.name: Berry Picking
ingredients: 1 ounce Lustau Los Arcos Amontillado sherry
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 whole strawberry, cut through the tip, leaving stem end intact
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled double Old-Fashioned glass. Place the strawberry on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Black Forest
ingredients: ¾ ounce Brown Butter–Infused Apple Brandy
¼ ounce Clear Creek Douglas fir brandy
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Mist the top of the drink with the tincture.

DRINKS.name: Bobby Burns
ingredients: ¾ ounce Carpano Antica Formula vermouth
1¾ ounces Graham Cracker-Infused Elijah Craig Single-Barrel Bourbon
DRINKS.garnish: 1 pinch cherry wood chips (enough to fill smoker)
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Campfire
ingredients: 1¾ ounces Graham Cracker-Infused Elijah Craig Single-Barrel Bourbon
DRINKS.garnish: 1 pinch cherry wood chips (enough to fill smoker)
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Using a PolyScience Smoking Gun (see ), smoke the top of the drink with cherry wood smoke. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Celery and Silk
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Chancellor
ingredients: ½ ounce Carpano Antica Formula vermouth
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Class Act
ingredients: 1 ounce Pierre Ferrand Pineau des Charentes
½ ounce St. George spiced pear liqueur
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with the pineapple wedge.

DRINKS.name: Coco and Ice
ingredients: ½ ounce Olmeca Altos reposado tequila
½ ounce Giffard Banane du Brésil
¼ ounce Caffé Lolita coffee liqueur
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large cube. Garnish with the banana chip.

DRINKS.name: Daisy Gun
ingredients: 1½ ounces Campo de Encanto Grand and Noble pisco
1 ounce Williams & Humbert Dry Sack sherry
DRINKS.directions: Pour the seltzer into a Collins glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes, then garnish with the lemon wedge and a few grates of nutmeg.

DRINKS.name: Dark Horse
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it onto the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Endless Summer
ingredients: ¼ ounce Giffard Crème de Pamplemousse
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a Collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the grapefruit wedge.

DRINKS.name: Fair Game
ingredients: 1½ ounces Williams & Humbert Dry Sack sherry
1 ounce Appleton Estate Reserve Blend rum
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker and whip, shaking with a few pieces of crushed ice, just until incorporated. Dump into a Collins glass and add crushed ice until the glass is about four-fifths full. Swizzle for a few seconds, then pack the glass with ice, mounding it above the rim. Garnish with the mint sprig and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: Fuji Legend
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 3 thin apple slices on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Pour the seltzer into a Collins glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes, then garnish with the apple slices.

DRINKS.name: Ganymede
ingredients: 2 ounces Narutotai Ginjo Nama Genchu sake
¼ ounce Lustau Los Arcos amontillado sherry
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the cherry.

DRINKS.name: Ginger Rogers
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: The Greatest Dancer
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Jet Set
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek 2-year apple brandy
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the mint sprig.

DRINKS.name: La Viña
ingredients: 1 ounce Lustau East India Solera sherry
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Little Victory
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then double strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the orange wedge.

DRINKS.name: Long-Distance Lover
ingredients: 1½ ounces Lustau Los Arcos amontillado sherry
¾ ounce St. George spiced pear liqueur
½ ounce Lustau Emilín Moscatel sherry
¼ ounce Copper & Kings unaged apple brandy
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 2 pineapple leaves, 1 orange half wheel, 1 lemon wheel, and 1 cinnamon stick
DRINKS.directions: In a shaker, gently muddle the orange, lemon, and pineapple with the orgeat. Add the remaining ingredients, shake with ice, then strain into a tall tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the pineapple leaves, orange half wheel, lemon wheel, and cinnamon stick and insert a straw. Just before serving, torch the end of the cinnamon stick until it begins to smoke.

DRINKS.name: Malibu
ingredients: ½ ounce Campo de Encanto Grand and Noble pisco
½ ounce Giffard Crème de Pamplemousse
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Serve with the toasted coconut chips alongside.

DRINKS.name: Night Light
ingredients: 1½ ounces Campo de Encanto Grand and Noble pisco
¾ ounce Fusion Napa Valley verjus blanc
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the grapefruit half wheel.

DRINKS.name: Normandie Club Martini #2
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 2 to 3 sprays of Rosemary Salt Solution
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Mist the top of the drink with the salt solution.

DRINKS.name: Nurse Hazel
ingredients: ¾ ounce Lustau Jarana fino sherry
½ ounce La Quintinye Vermouth Royal blanc
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Peach Boy
DRINKS.directions: Short shake all the ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass. Top with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint bouquet and insert a straw.

DRINKS.name: Penicillin
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 3 sprays of Islay scotch and 1 piece of candied ginger on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Mist the top of the drink with the scotch, then garnish with the candied ginger.

DRINKS.name: Professor Hinkle
ingredients: ½ ounce Clear Creek raspberry brandy
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a teacup or chilled coupe. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Rendezvous in Chennai
ingredients: ¼ ounce Blume Marillen apricot eau-de-vie
¼ ounce Rothman & Winter apricot liqueur
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Rob Roy
ingredients: ¾ ounce Carpano Antica Formula vermouth
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 brandied cherry on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the brandied cherry.

DRINKS.name: Root Beer Float
ingredients: ½ ounce Giffard Vanille de Madagascar
⅛ teaspoon phosphoric acid solution (see <!-- XLINK --
DRINKS.garnish: 2 drops Terra Spice root beer extract
DRINKS.directions: Chill all the ingredients. Combine them in a carbonation bottle, charge with CO for setup and general carbonation instructions). Place the bottle in the refrigerator for at least 20 minutes before opening. To serve, carefully pour into a Highball glass with ice.

DRINKS.name: Rye Pie
ingredients: ½ ounce St. George raspberry brandy
¼ ounce Clear Creek cherry brandy
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: 1 lemon wheel and 1 brandied cherry on a skewer
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the lemon wheel and cherry.

DRINKS.name: Salvation Julep
DRINKS.directions: Combine all the ingredients in a Julep tin and fill the tin about halfway with crushed ice. Holding the tin by the rim, stir, churning the ice as you go, for about 10 seconds. Add more crushed ice to fill the tin about two-thirds full and stir until the tin is completely frosted. Add more ice to form a cone above the rim. Garnish with the mint sprig and serve with a straw.

DRINKS.name: SS Cruiser
ingredients: ¼ ounce St. George raspberry brandy
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients (except the crémant) with ice, then double strain into a wineglass filled with ice. Pour in the crémant, and quickly dip the barspoon into the glass to gently mix the wine with the cocktail. Garnish with the mint sprig and raspberry.

DRINKS.name: Thick as Thieves
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Marie Brizard white crème de cacao
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. No garnish.

DRINKS.name: Troubled Leisure
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it onto the edge of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Unidentified Floral Objects
ingredients: 1 ounce Dupont Pays d’Auge Original Calvados
¼ ounce Laird’s 100-proof straight apple brandy
¼ ounce Blume Marillen apricot eau-de-vie
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Warspite
ingredients: ¼ ounce Clear Creek blue plum brandy
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the orange twist over the drink, then gently rub it around the rim of the glass and place it into the drink.

DRINKS.name: Wolf Tone
ingredients: 1 ounce Campo de Encanto Grand and Noble pisco
¾ ounce Clear Creek Pinot Noir grappa
DRINKS.directions: Stir all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Express the lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.
